import React from 'react' import Page from '../components/Page' import NProgress from "nprogress" import Router from "next/router" import "../components/styles/nprogress.css" Router.events.on("routeChangeStart",() => NProgress.start()) Router.events.on("routeChangeCompltes",() => NProgress.end()) Router.events.on("routeChangeError",() => NProgress.end()) // _app.js can be used to render the component which is required on every page. Ex. // navbar, sidebar etc. const _app = ({Component,mainProps,router}) => { return ( <>

{router.pathname}

) } export default _app
